titleStmt.title: Description of British Library, Or 2493: Fragments of Arabic translation and commentaries on the book of Exodus.

notesStmt.note: Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Fragments of Arabic translation and commentaries on the book of Exodus.

msItem.title: Fragments of Arabic translation and commentaries on the book of Exodus.

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 1; ruled lines: 15 32; written lines: 15 32; Uniform layout. Visible hard-point ruling.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Oriental square and semi-cursive script, partially punctuated, of approximately 14th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine title: 'Exodus with Comm. Hebrew & Arabic. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2493.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Moses Wilhelm Shapira (b. 1830, d. 1884), a antiquities dealer of Jerusalem: purchased by the British Library from him on 08 July 1882, folio [88v].
